content: Based on current spot FX rates, our updated guidance for the full year 2022 is as follows: total enrollment to be in the range of 420,000 to 423,000 students reflecting growth of 9%, on an organic basis versus 2021; revenue to be in the range of $1.223 billion to $1.231 billion reflecting growth of 12% on an organic constant currency basis and 13%, on a reported basis versus 2021; and adjusted EBITDA to be in the range of $331 million to $337 million, reflecting growth of 23% to 25% on an organic constant currency basis versus 2021, or an increase of 31% to 33% on a reported basis, which includes the effect of the noncash FAS five charge in 2021.
